name: Underwater Shark Bounty Hunter-Era of Beast Slayer
name_original: Underwater Shark Bounty Hunter-Era of Beast Slayer
description:
Consider yourself the best underwater shark hunter? Prove your skills in thebest Underwater Shark Hunter Sniper simulator game of 2017.
The game consists of 2 HD environments. First is the overwater environment over the blue ocean surrounded by a mysterious island. You will feel like a real hunter. Second is the underwater environment in which you'll be swimming with the sharks.
You'll have a big arsenal of sniper guns to choose from and a lot of sea animals to hunt.
So what are you waiting for ? Lets go hunt some sharks.

Features of Underwater Shark Hunter 2017:

• 2 Game Modes: Career Mode & Survival Mode
• 2 High Quality Environments: Underwater Environment & Surface Island Environment
• Other Sea Animals like dolphins, eel, squid, whale, fish for realistic Water Environment
• 6 Highly Engaging Levels
• Smooth And Easy Sniper Controls
• Thrilling Shark Hunting Experience
• Underwater Shark Hunting & Shark Raft Hunting Challenges
• Multiple Sniper Guns to choose from
